en..instructions:
This module will test your proficiency of the insert operation into a linked list. You must trace the path down the linked list and insert the given value.

  1. Starting at the first node in the list, click the successive nodes until you reach the node you want to ahead of.
  2. Then click 'Create New Node' and click the empty node to add the value to it.
  3. Next click the node you want the new created node to point to.
  4. Finally click the node to point to the new node and hit 'Insert'
  5. Repeat until all values are inserted.
